product_name: Outside Inside Free Style Bocce Set
long_description: For some active fun on your next picnic, road trip or camping trip, bring the family-friendly Free Style Bocce Set from Outside Inside. It's entertaining for 2 or more players ages 5 and up. Instead of rolling balls as in traditional bocce, players toss these soft balls; instructions included. Comes in a nylon-and-mesh zippered pouch with a carabiner; pouch measures 9 x 1.75 in. Set includes 9 soft, beanbag-type balls.
short_description: For some active fun on your next picnic, road trip or camping trip, bring the family-friendly Free Style Bocce Set from Outside Inside. It's entertaining for 2 or more players ages 5 and up.
